titleStmt.title: The anti-Protestant, or, Miles aganst Prance being a solemn protestation of Miles Prance, concerning the murder of Sir Edmondbury Godfrey, in direct opposition to a late protestation made by him on the same subject.
titleStmt.author: Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Entry for A3505 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
